fields.title: Protoline Integration
fields.summary: Arthexis.com ready for the 0.2 version upgrade within 72 hours, please standby.
fields.content:
## Protoline Integration Rollout

Arthexis.com will upgrade to version 0.2 to enable the new Protoline workflow and refreshed device telemetry.

### Schedule

- **Deployment window:** November 16, 2025 at 6:00 a.m. CST
- **Expected duration:** 2 hours
- **Impact:** Short authentication pauses while services recycle

### Highlights

1. Native Protoline connector with live diagnostics.
2. Expanded charger analytics dashboards for launch-day monitoring.
3. Guided onboarding for site operators rolling out the new workflows.

### Next Steps

- Review the Protoline configuration guide in advance.
- Notify partners about the maintenance window.
- Join the deployment stand-up 30 minutes before the cutover.
